# Data process


## Finland

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

The study-specific variables elected to be harmonised is:


* Name: `q3001_used_tobac`
* Label: `Used tobaco?`
* Categories:
   + `1 = YES` 
   + `2 = NO` 
* Missings
   + `NA`

* Name: `q3002_use_tobaco`
* Label: `Use tobaco?`
* Categories:
   + `1 = YES, DAILY`
   + `2 = YES, NOT DAILY`
   + `3 = NOT AT ALL` 
* Missings
   + `NA`

```{r assign finland w1, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking','Courage.Courage_Finland_w1', variables=list('q3001_used_tobac','q3002_use_tobaco'), missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local finland w1, echo=F}
COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking <- opal.execute(o,'COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking')
Categorical_summary(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac)
ggplot(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking, aes(x=factor(q3001_used_tobac))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Ever smoked") + ylab("Frequency")
Categorical_summary(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco)
ggplot(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking, aes(x=factor(q3002_use_tobaco))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Current smoker") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `q3001=2 into 0`
* `q3001=1&q3002=3 into 1` 
* `q3002=1|q3002=2 into 2` 
* `NA into 999` 

```{r harmo finland w1}
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$id)
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking <- rep(999,length(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$id))
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking[COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac==2]<-0
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking[COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac==1&COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco==3]<-1
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking[COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco==1|COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco==2]<-2
#COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking <- Recode(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac, "1 = '1';2 = '0';NA = '999'")
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking, labels = cat_label)
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript finland w1, echo=F}
Categorical_summary(var = COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1, aes(x=factor(smoking))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Smoking") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation finland w1, echo=F}
AfterH <- table(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$smoking)
X <- c(sum(na.omit(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac==2)),sum(na.omit(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac==1&COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco==3)),sum(na.omit(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco==1|COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3002_use_tobaco==2)))
BeforeH<- c(X,sum(is.na(COURAGE_finland_w1_smoking$q3001_used_tobac)))
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("q3001=2->0","q3001=1&q3002=3->1","q3002=1|q3002=2->1","NA->999") 
kable(C)
```

```{r final, echo = F}

l.hds <- list(fin_w1 = COURAGE_ds_fin_w1, pol_w1 = COURAGE_ds_pol_w1, spain_w1 = COURAGE_ds_spain_w1, spain_w2 = COURAGE_ds_spain_w2)
ln.hds <- names(l.hds)

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  m_name <- paste0("COURAGE_m_ds_",name)
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label # Text value assigned at the DS description, at the top
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cat_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cat_label[1:3])
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  rm(aux_object)
}

```


## Descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

Percentages of categories in each harmonised variable by cohort:

**R script:**


```{r summ}
t.hds <- frq(l.hds[[1]][2])[[1]][,c(1,2)] 
for (i in seq_along(ln.hds)){
  t.hds[2+i] <- frq(l.hds[[ln.hds[i]]][2])[[1]][,4] 
}
t.hds[14,] <- c("n", "sample size", 
             length(l.hds[[ln.hds[1]]][[2]]), length(l.hds[[ln.hds[2]]][[2]]) , length(l.hds[[ln.hds[3]]][[2]]), length(l.hds[[ln.hds[4]]][[2]]))
names(t.hds)<-c("val", "label", "Finland_w1", "Poland_W1", "Spain_W1", "Spain_W2")
kable(t.hds)

```
